bibl.title: Artemidorus' Geographoumena in the Ethnika of Stephanus of Byzantium: Source and Transmission.
Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008)
bibl.author: BILLERBECK, Margarethe

bibl.note: P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). See in part. pp. 80-81: "If the objections on historical grounds can be refuted and the papyrus shown in other respects to predate Marcianus, then obviously the text in col. IV, 1-14, of P. Artemid. must be genuine Artemidorus."
BILLERBECK Margarethe, Artemidorus' Geographoumena in the Ethnika of Stephanus of Byzantium: Source and Transmission.

Kai BRODERSEN and Ja≈õ ELSNER (Edd.), Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008) = Historia. Einzelschriften. 214 (Stuttgart, 2009) pp. 65-87, 2 tabl.
